text: My poslaly nashym kur'yeram pidtrymanym yasnymy dokazamy, ta my poslaly vnyz yim svyate pysannya ta zakon, shcho lyudy mozhutʹ uphold spravedlyvistʹ. Ta my poslaly vnyz zalizo, prychomu ye syla, ta bahato vyhod dlya lyudey. Vse tse na poryadku dennomu dlya BOHA rozriznyty tsi khto by pidtrymav Yoho ta Yoho kur'yeriv, na viri. BOH ye Potuzhnyy, Mohutniy
